channel.title: Want Runescape Models now with Color (Kinda)
channel.description:
[b]What Format can they come in?[/b] - As of right now they only come in .obj or wavefront model format.
[b]How do i get them?[/b] http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=obj&id=<Insert runescape model id here>
[b]How does it work?[/b] i use a servlet to convert the jagex model format into obj.
[b]What other useless details can you give me about these models?[/b] http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=text&id=<Insert runescape model id here>
[b] Examples: [/b]
Object Example: http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=obj&id=30200 Text example: http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=text&id=30200
[b]Whats to come in the future[/b] a few more model formats wouldnt be bad since wavefront is kind of nasty when it comes to coloring or texturing. [img]http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/mdl.png[/img]
[hr] Update added new model type VRML tried adding color but its slightly retarded as soon as i find the error ill fix it but your welcome to try it out all you got to do is
http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=vrml&id=<model id>
Example: http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=vrml&id=26662
Screenshot: [img]http://silabsoft.no-ip.org/render2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Want Runescape Models now with Color (Kinda)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

IE users can now explore the models online via Cortona VRML client just change the type to view

example: http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=view&id=30450

*note most of the time you need to select fit to screen for the model to appear correctly.

Read full topic

item.title: Want Runescape Models now with Color (Kinda)
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

First. Yes OBJs can be converted to anything else basically. Any 3D Program can handle OBJs really.

And the problem you’re experiencing (or I think it’s the one you’re thinking of) is phong shading. The shading angles are kinda screwed up. Easily fixed, but I know nothing about what program you’re using.

Read full topic

item.title: Want Runescape Models now with Color (Kinda)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

What Format can they come in?

  • As of right now they only come in .obj or wavefront model format.

How do i get them?
http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=obj&id=

How does it work?
i use a servlet to convert the jagex model format into obj.

What other useless details can you give me about these models?
http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=text&id=

Examples:

Object Example: http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=obj&id=30200
Text example: http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=text&id=30200

Whats to come in the future
a few more model formats wouldnt be bad since wavefront is kind of nasty when it comes to coloring or texturing.

[hr]
Update added new model type VRML tried adding color but its slightly retarded as soon as i find the error ill fix it but your welcome to try it out all you got to do is

http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=vrml&id=

Example:
http://silabsoft.no-ip.org:8080/servlet/Model?type=vrml&id=26662
